program.name: Zero Install
program.author: Thomas Leonard
program.title: Zero Install: Downloads
program.p: 0launch is a small Python program. You ask it to run a program by giving it the program's full name (a web address). It does not need to be installed or run as root. It does not write to any shared directories (like /usr/bin or /usr/lib). It stores downloads in a cache directory so that you don't need to download anything twice, and programs can still be used when you are off-line.
